VII.iii.1.A.3.l
.
Effect of Rate Changes on the Primary Award
A Veteran’s award may be subject to future rate changes that will not be reflected in an apportionee’s award.
Example
:  The Veteran’s award (total award) will be prospectively reduced based on a reduction in her combined disability rating from 100 percent to 80 percent.  However, there is no change in the apportioned amount.
An apportionee award must not provide for any future rate change for any period beyond the last future rate provided for by the Veteran’s award.
